description: Delay filtering to match a cue.
name: cue

options.description: The cue timestamp expressed in a UNIX timestamp in microseconds. Default is 0.
options.name: cue

options.description: The duration of content to pass on as preroll expressed in seconds. Default is 0.
options.name: preroll

options.description: The maximum duration of content to buffer before waiting for the cue expressed in seconds. Default is 0.
options.name: buffer
